title: The Choice
description: Rules and demands are all that Selena knows how to live by in the world of underground crime. Emotions have no place in her world, yet why does her partner in blood ignite a love so fierce it could be the difference between life and death? Moving away to the opposite side of the country, Selena finds out there are worse things than running from love and they come equipped with fangs.
author: Alexei Knightsbridge
